(Photo credit: Wikipedia) Today the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency released the evidence it compiled against Lance Armstrong, who was stripped of his seven Tour De France titles in August when he decided to not fight the agency’s charges against him. The most damning part of the report: 11 of his former teammate testified [...]

Lance Armstrong was ringleader of biggest doping conspiracy in sporting history, say USADA #amman #JO

 Lance Armstrong’s legacy as cancer survivor turned seven-time winner of the   Tour de France is in ruins after he was accused of drug-taking on a massive   scale, and being the ringleader of the most sophisticated doping conspiracy   in sporting history.
